backend/main.mo: Canister implementing video metadata, chunk storage, shorts, user preferences, profiles, and access-controlled admin/user APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/config CSS defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global style resets.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry for the app with PWA meta tags, icons, manifest, and script bootstrap.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, theme, icons, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, runtime caching, navigation fallback, and media caching rules.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring TanStack Router, React Query, theme provider, routes, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/account/ProfileM: Provides a profile dropdown with sign-in, navigation links, and sign‑out functionality based on user identity and profile data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile-only bottom navigation bar with route-based highlighting and links to core app sections.
frontend/src/components/ChannelHeader.ts: Displays a channel's header with avatar, stats, and follow button, including a skeleton state while loading.
frontend/src/components/CommentSection.t: Renders a comment list and input form with authentication checks and simulated posting behavior.
frontend/src/components/FollowButton.tsx: Toggle button for following/unfollowing channels with simulated async updates and identity checks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with logo, search, notifications, and profile menu, supporting mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout combining header, sidebar, bottom navigation, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Renders a notifications dropdown showing unread counts, formatted notifications, and actions to mark items as read.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: A dialog form for editing and saving user profile fields including bio, social links, and images.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Shows a PWA install prompt with platform-specific behavior, handling install events and user dismissal.
frontend/src/components/settings/MoodAIS: Displays and updates Mood AI settings, allowing authenticated users to toggle the feature and select their current mood.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Left navigation sidebar listing main app sections with active-path highlighting.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Thumbnail card for a video showing title, channel info, stats, and links to watch or view the channel.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Loads and plays video streams using chunked fetching with progress, error, and offline fallback states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChunkedVideoUpload: Implements chunked video upload with metadata submission, progress tracking, cancellation, and retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodSignals.ts: Tracks user engagement signals in localStorage and infers a mood based on watch, like, and activity patterns.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Loads, stores, seeds, and updates user-specific notifications based on Internet Identity, with helpers to mark items as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions such as fetching videos, metadata, shorts, and mood preferences, with placeholders for unimplemented calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, global styles, scrollbar hiding, and mobile safe-area padding.
frontend/src/lib/followCopy.ts: Contains static UI copy for follow-related labels, titles, and follower count formatting.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/videoFileMetadata.ts: Extracts duration, resolution, and MIME type from a video file using a temporary video element with timeout fallback.
frontend/src/lib/videoStreamSource.ts: Implements incremental backend chunk fetching to assemble streamed video data into a blob URL for playback.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity Provider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChannelPage.tsx: Displays a user’s channel with profile data, mock videos, and editing for the owner; requires sign‑in and loads banner, social links, and content.
frontend/src/pages/FollowingPage.tsx: Shows videos from followed channels using mock data, with sign‑in gating and an empty‑state fallback.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home feed with mock video cards for discovery.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Displays a user’s uploaded and liked videos in tabbed sections, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides a multi‑section settings UI for general, playback, privacy, and notification preferences.
frontend/src/pages/ShortsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays vertical shorts with mood‑based recommendations, playback tracking, and scroll‑driven navigation.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Handles authenticated video uploads with metadata extraction, progress, error handling, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/UploadShortPage.tsx: Page for uploading short videos with duration validation, Internet Identity auth, and React Query mutation to submit the short.
frontend/src/pages/WatchPage.tsx: Video watch page showing metadata, player, comments, like/dislike logic, offline detection, and activity tracking via mood signals.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers and manages the service worker in production, provides unregister helper, and utilities for standalone/offline checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme, colors, typography, animations, and content scanning paths for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, generated assets, and existing feature metadata.
